info.name: Dark Dashboard for Coinbase
info.description:
For you who don't enjoy the bright theme for the Coinbase dash.

Other pages will display normally as to not interfere with your coin buying and selling experience! Please donate if you would like a completely dark theme for all pages, otherwise for now this is the page the style is applied to: coinbase.com/dashboard

Improvements:

  • Darker colours to fit with your other trading apps

    • Donations always welcome to this LTC address: LNfjY6cLA2fHjLqqDRcVuTpu5buDpJHMTi

    Please remember that Coinbase is not the best trading platform out there, using it sparingly or if you do very few transactions!

    If you use also use the service cointracker.network, check out the matching style here: cointracker.network
info.additionalInfo: Ver 1.0 : Merry Xmas from Sweden Ver 1.1 : Minus sign now in red colour Ver 1.2 : Charts style updated Ver 1.3 : Header & Footer simplified & compacted to match style used in Cointracker theme Ver 1.4 : Drop shadows on large texts, thicker chart line
